name: The Protective Samurai
description:
Summary:

In the feudal palace some violent octopus have seen the oportunity of taking control of the palace. All the civilian people and animals are supposed to be evacuated. Our samurai is the only one that can hold them... but he founds a stray cat, and the octopus have no mercy.

You control both players. Protect the cat and assure the gardens of the palace!

Controls:

A S D W / Arrows: move cat.  

Right Click: move samurai.

Left click: attack with samurai.

Spacebar: speacial attack with samurai. 

Crédits:
